SongLyrics.JpnStr: 頭[あたま]じゃ分[わ]かっていても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I understand it in my head

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 心[こころ]が追[お]いつかない
SongLyrics.EngStr: My heart can't keep up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: カラダは単純[たんじゅん]シンプルなのね
SongLyrics.EngStr: My body is simple and straightforward

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 男[おとこ]なら尚更[なおさら]ね あぁあ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even more so if you're a man, ahh

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よ]な夜[よ]なゆらゆらいでも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though I sway night after night

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 未[いま]だに君[きみ]がいちばん
SongLyrics.EngStr: You are still number one to me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 最低[さいてい]で大好[だいす]きだった
SongLyrics.EngStr: You were the worst but I loved you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: なんでかな ムカつくわ。もう
SongLyrics.EngStr: Why is that? It's frustrating, really

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 忘[わす]れちゃいたいのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though I want to forget

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ずっと傷[きず]つけられてばっかだったのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even though I kept getting hurt all along

SongLyrics.JpnStr: シンデレラボーイ 0時[じ]を回[まわ]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Cinderella Boy, after midnight

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 腕[うで]の中[なか]であたしを泣[な]かせないで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't make me cry in your arms

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 気[き]づかないふりをしてそのまま
SongLyrics.EngStr: You pretend not to notice, just like that

SongLyrics.JpnStr: つけるタバコが大嫌[だいきら]い
SongLyrics.EngStr: I hate it when you light a cigarette

SongLyrics.EngStr: A wet bath towel

SongLyrics.EngStr: Hung up in the bathroom at 8 o'clock

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 散[ち]らかった部屋[へや]にはひとり
SongLyrics.EngStr: Alone in a messy room

SongLyrics.JpnStr: またカラダ許[ゆる]してしまったな
SongLyrics.EngStr: I gave my body away again

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]がいなくなっても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if you are gone

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あたしは平気[へいき]そうです
SongLyrics.EngStr: I seem to be fine

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 連絡[れんらく]はたまにするね
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll contact you occasionally

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 意地悪[いじわる]くらいさせてよね
SongLyrics.EngStr: At least let me be mean

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 嘘[うそ]くらいせめてちゃんと
SongLyrics.EngStr: At least lie properly

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 次[つぎ]は上手[じょうず]につかなきゃね
SongLyrics.EngStr: Next time, I'll have to lie better

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あたしの前[まえ]だけで弱[よわ]さを見[み]せて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Show your weakness only in front of me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 無邪気[むじゃき]な顔[かお]で呼[よ]んでみて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Call me with an innocent face

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]の瞳[ひとみ] 独占[どくせん]させて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let me monopolize your eyes

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]も見[み]ないでいて欲[ほ]しかっただけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just wanted you to look at no one else

SongLyrics.EngStr: I hate it when you light a cigarette

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 好[す]きって言[い]わんでよ 愛[あい]しても無[な]いのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't say you love me when you don't

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 瞳[ひとみ]の奥[おく]、あたしを捕[つか]まえて
